Detailed Description

Write access for sub-matrix classes.

Author:
Lee Netherton
The SubMatrixWriteAccess class provides basic write operatons for the MatrixOperator classes, and the sub matrix class itself. Each writable sub matrix class will have a pointer to a SubMatrixWriteAccess.

Definition at line 190 of file matrix_access.h.
